mapper.select: select b.sidoName, b.gugunName, b.dongName, b.dongCode, b.lat, b.lng from baseaddress b, userloc ul where ul.userid = #{userId} and ul.dongCode = b.dongCode

select b.sidoName, b.gugunName, b.dongName, b.dongCode, b.lat, b.lng from baseaddress b, (SELECT dongcode, COUNT(dongcode) FROM userloc GROUP BY dongcode order by COUNT(dongcode) desc limit 3) d where d.dongcode = b.dongCode
